sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_881da250c386321098d1190ed4013180
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>change_request</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition/><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>Calculate Risk Score</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous) {

	var score = 0;

    // score based on environment impact
    if (current.u_environment == 'Production') {
        score += 5;
    } else if (current.u_environment == 'UAT') {
        score += 3;
    } else {
        score += 1;
    }

    // score based on outage duration.
    if (current.u_outage_duration > 4) {
        score += 5;
    } else if (current.u_outage_duration > 1) {
        score += 3;
    }

    // score based on CI impact
    if (current.cmdb_ci) {
        var ci = current.cmdb_ci.getRefRecord();
        if (ci.sys_class_name == 'cmdb_ci_server') {
            score += 4;
        }
    }

    current.u_risk_score = score;

    
    if (score >= 10) {
        current.risk = 'High';
    } else if (score >= 6) {
        current.risk = 'Moderate';
    } else {
        current.risk = 'Low';
    }

})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-12-22 10:21:20</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>881da250c386321098d1190ed4013180</sys_id><sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Calculate Risk Score</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_881da250c386321098d1190ed4013180</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-12-28 12:09:44</sys_updated_on><template/><when>before</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=881da250c386321098d1190ed4013180"/></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_b6dae9e15317101034d1ddeeff7b1278
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>false</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>change_request</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition table="change_request">chg_modelISNOTEMPTY^stateVALCHANGES^EQ<item endquery="false" field="chg_model" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="ISNOTEMPTY" or="false" value=""/><item endquery="false" field="state" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="VALCHANGES" or="false" value=""/><item endquery="true" field="" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value=""/></filter_condition><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>Change Model: Check State Transition</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous) {
	if (!previous)
		return;
	
	var changeModel = new ChangeModel(current.chg_model.getRefRecord());
	var stateFieldName = changeModel.getStateFieldName();
	var initialStateGr = changeModel.getInitialState();
	
	// If it's a new record in the initial state, or the model has changed and it's in the initial state don't do anything.
	if ((current.isNewRecord() || current.chg_model.changes()) && current.getValue(stateFieldName) === initialStateGr.getValue("state_value"))
		return;
	
	var previousState = previous.getValue(stateFieldName);
	var previousDisplayValue = previous.getDisplayValue(stateFieldName);
	
	if ((!previousState && current.isNewRecord()) ||
		(current.chg_model.changes() && current.getValue(stateFieldName) !== initialStateGr.getValue("state_value"))) {
		previousState = initialStateGr;
		previousDisplayValue = initialStateGr.getDisplayValue("state_label");
	}
	
	// Check if we can transition between the states.
	if (!changeModel.canTransition(previousState, current)) {
		gs.addErrorMessage(gs.getMessage("Change model '{0}' prevented state transition from {1} to {2}", [current.getDisplayValue("chg_model"), previousDisplayValue, current.getDisplayValue(stateFieldName)]));
		current.setAbortAction(true);
	}

})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2020-09-16 20:18:13</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path/><sys_id>b6dae9e15317101034d1ddeeff7b1278</sys_id><sys_mod_count>10</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Change Model: Check State Transition</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Change Management - Change Models" source="com.snc.change_management.change_model">e75dccbfe17622108bb2327e625886ff</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_b6dae9e15317101034d1ddeeff7b1278</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-12-28 12:08:55</sys_updated_on><template/><when>before</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=b6dae9e15317101034d1ddeeff7b1278"/></record_update>
